Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.interfaces

Interface DynamicConnectionRequestCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentInterface, OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicConnectionRequestConnector, DynamicConnectionRequestInboundPort, DynamicConnectionRequestOutboundPort
    public interface DynamicConnectionRequestCI
extends OfferedCI, RequiredCI
    The interface DynamicConnectionRequestCI is offered by components that propose a dynamic connection through some other dynamically connected interface.

    Description

    See the fr.sorbonne_u.components.patterns.dconnection package documentation.

    Created on : 2013-01-23

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void removeDynamicPort​(java.lang.Class<? extends OfferedCI> offeredInterface, java.lang.String uri)
      remove the inbound port with the given URI that implements the given offered interface, if it exists.
      java.lang.String requestDynamicPortURI​(java.lang.Class<? extends OfferedCI> offeredInterface)
      provides the URI of a new port implementing some interface that is offered through a dynamic connection, so the receiver creates a port and sends its URI back.

    • Method Detail

      • requestDynamicPortURI

        java.lang.String requestDynamicPortURI​(java.lang.Class<? extends OfferedCI> offeredInterface)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        provides the URI of a new port implementing some interface that is offered through a dynamic connection, so the receiver creates a port and sends its URI back.

        Contract

         pre    offeredInterface != null
 post   result != null
        Parameters:
        offeredInterface - interface of the connection to be established.
        Returns:
        the URI of an inbound port implementing offeredInterface.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • removeDynamicPort

        void removeDynamicPort​(java.lang.Class<? extends OfferedCI> offeredInterface,
                       java.lang.String uri)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        remove the inbound port with the given URI that implements the given offered interface, if it exists.

        Contract

         pre    offeredInterface != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        offeredInterface - server-side offered interface.
        uri - URI of a previously created port.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
